attributes.action: Counter-claim for the deaths of british soldiers when any member of a Taliban family attempts to claim compensation from the UK.
attributes.additional_details: That they even countenance a claim against the UK, instead of immediately dismissing it, demonstrates the absolute paucity of our current cohort of political dishonourables.  When a claim is received it should immediately be counterclaimed by a submission for compensation for the families of each and every member of the british forces who died at the hands of the Taliban.
